thread.title: Deirdre
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Deirdre

author: Deirdre
title: Deirdre
text: Country Attire has a great selection. They are fast on shipping and comms, which is perfect when you're excited about your order. Great offering, fantastic service, looking forward to ordering more!
